Key Match Events: The match went into a Super Over after both teams scored 212 runs in the regular innings.
Rohit Sharma hit several boundaries and was replaced by Rinku Singh during the second Super Over.
India won the match in the second Super Over with a score of 11/2, while Afghanistan scored 1/2.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed his displeasure after the first Super Over ended in a tie.
The match was a thrilling contest that kept fans on the edge of their seats.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru.
Rinku Singh was brought in as a substitute to accelerate India's scoring in the second Super Over.
Ravi Bishnoi took crucial wickets for India in the second Super Over.
